text: English singsing
Imagining the Future World
There’s too much traffic.
I wish a flying car existed now!
I’m sure there will be flying cars in the near future.
Oh, really?
Then will a swimming car be invented too?
Duh! A driverless car has already been invented, so why not a swimming car?
No way!
That’s something I’ve been dreaming of!
Our dream is turning into reality.
It will be so much different in the future.
I agree.
I think future robots will take a prominent place in our lives.
There will be adoctor robot for surgery, a Humanoid for copying human’s actions,
and a drone for making deliveries.
Actually, these kinds of robots are already being developed.
I think, in the future, humans will discover new planets and start livingwith aliens!
Oh, do you really think there are aliens?
Of course! I’ve always been dreaming about meeting an alien!
You might meet one in the near future.
